Zararsýz sayýlabilecek bir yýlan. Boynundan kuyruðuna dek uzanan kýzýl

mobiles.description: Mor giysilere bürünmüþ. Aman dikkatli ol, oldukça saldýrgandýr...

mobiles.long_description: Pirinç Ejderha'yý görüyorsun, yüzünü sana çevirip nefesiyle ýsýnmaný saðlýyor.

mobiles.long_description: Göçebe savaþçýlarýn komutaný burada, seni izliyor.
mobiles.description:
O göçebelerin ikinci lideri. Ýpekten pahalý giysilerinin içinde yine de

mobiles.name: genç köle
mobiles.long_description: Genç bir köle burada, yorgun gözlerle sana bakýyor.

mobiles.name: kemik ejderan

mobiles.description:
Üzerinden sarkan az miktarda eti saymazsak sadece kemiklerden oluþmuþ
bir mahlukat. Artýk ölümden de korkmuyor!

mobiles.name: kara cüce
mobiles.long_description: Elindekiyle taþlarý oyan bir cüce görüyorsun.
mobiles.description: Bu kara cüce kafaný kýrmak için sabýrsýzlanýyor.

mobiles.name: mantar þaman
mobiles.long_description: Ýrice bir mantar görüyorsun, seni izliyor.

mobiles.name: toprak kazýcý
mobiles.long_description: Bir toprak kazýcý görüyorsun, seni aþaðý çaðýrýyor.

mobiles.name: azgýn deve
mobiles.long_description: Oldukça tehlikeli bir deve sana bakýyor.

objects.description: Küçük bir gürz burada, kafa kýrmayý bekliyor.

objects.name: parlak þeritli zýrh
objects.description: Parlak bir zýrh burada, yeni bir sahip bekliyor.

objects.name: güçlü kargý
objects.description: Güçlü bir kargý duvara dayanmýþ, bekliyor.

objects.name: muska

objects.name: bacak kemiði
objects.description: Büyükçe bir bacak kemiði burada unutulmuþ.

objects.description: Kalýn kumaþlý bir türban burada býrakýlmýþ.

objects.name: sikke
objects.description: Büyük bir miktar sikke burada býrakýlmýþ. Bu ne dikkatsizlik!

objects.name: þifreli parþömen
objects.description: Bir kaðýt rulosu ayaklarýnýn dibinde dinleniyor.

objects.name: demir kemerli sandýk
objects.description: Demir kemerleri olan bir sandýk burada býrakýlmýþ.

objects.name: bakýr bileklik
objects.description: Yýpranmýþ bir bakýr bileklik burada, yeni bir sahip bekliyor.

objects.name: yakut
objects.description: Ýrice bir yakut burada, üzerini tozla kapatýyor.

objects.name: parýltýlý elmas
objects.description: Parýltýlý bir elmas burada, ayaklarýnýn dibinde uzanýyor.

rooms.name: Uzun Tünel
rooms.description:
You encounter some rapids as you enter this tunnel cut out of
the mountains by the river.

rooms.name: Uzun Tünel
rooms.description: The tunnel branches off north.

rooms.name: Uzun Tünel
rooms.description: The tunnel branches off south.

rooms.name: Uzun Tünel
rooms.description: The tunnel branches off to the south.

rooms.name: Yeraltý Gölü
rooms.description:
You are floating on a jet-black underground lake fed by dripping
water and lime from above. The tunnel continues to the east and the river
leads back west. To the north is a roughly-hewn hallway. There is also
a tunnel south.

rooms.name: Uzun Dar Tünel
rooms.description: The tunnel rises sharply to the east.

rooms.name: Geniþ Tünel
rooms.description:
The tunnel continues east and west. To the east the tunnel dives
down into a bright light.

rooms.name: Maðara
rooms.description:
You stand at the edge of a large pile of rubble created from the last
rockslide.

exits.description: You can easily slide down the rocks without getting hurt.

rooms.name: Taþ Yýðýnýnda
rooms.description:
You are at the bottom of a large pile of rubble. A tunnel branches
off to the north and east.

rooms.name: Maðara Giriþi
rooms.description:
You stand in the middle of a large and beautiful cave. A path leads
deeper into the darkness.

exits.description: You look down into the cave. Bones are strewn about everywhere.

rooms.name: Dev Maðarasý
rooms.description:
This cavern overwhelms you. The walls and ceiling seem miles away.
Bones of previous adventurers lie strewn on the cavern floor.

rooms.name: Dar Kývrým
rooms.description: The tunnel turns to the south and west.

rooms.name: Büyük Maðara
rooms.description: You are standing in a large cave. Many furs are spread out on the floor.

rooms.name: Rutubetli Koridor
rooms.description: The walls here are extremely damp, as well as the floor.

rooms.name: Yeraltý Havuzu
rooms.description: You are wading in a knee deep pool of lime-water.

rooms.name: Rutubetli Koridor
rooms.description:
The walls of the tunnel are extremely damp here. You hear the faint
sound of running water to the south.

rooms.name: Dar ve Alçak Koridor
rooms.description:
This crawlway is just big enough for a human to crawl through or a
halfling to walk through.

exits.description: You smell the fragrant odor of fungus.

rooms.name: Büyük ve Derin Maðara
rooms.description:
You have entered a very large cavern. The rock formations would amaze
almost any dwarf.

rooms.name: Mantar Yolu
rooms.description:
As you walk through the fungus patch, you are shot at by many millions of
spores. You can hardly breathe.

exits.description: The fragrant smell of fungus spores continues to the east

rooms.name: Mantar Yolu
rooms.description:
As you walk along the path, millions of spores are shot at you. You can
hardly breathe.

exits.description: A giant mushroom temple stands to the south.
The fragrant smell of spores continues to the west.

rooms.name: Mantar Tapýnaðý
rooms.description:
You find yourself standing inside of a giant mushroom. The inside
is decorated in the fashion of a temple.

rooms.name: Meðilli Pasaj
rooms.description: You follow a path sloping down from the fungus temple.

rooms.name: Meðilli Pasaj
rooms.description: You are on a path that gently slopes up from the underground pool.

exits.description: You hear sounds of trickling water.

rooms.name: Sýcak Kumlar
rooms.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you.
You feel lost.

rooms.name: Sýcak Kumlar
rooms.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you.
You feel lost.

exits.description: You see a nomad camp by an oasis.

rooms.name: Sýcak Kumlar
rooms.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you.
You feel lost.

rooms.name: Sýcak Kumlar
rooms.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you.
You feel lost.

exits.description: You see a river flowing into the mountain.

rooms.name: Sýcak Kumlar
rooms.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you.
You feel lost.

rooms.name: Sýcak Kumlar
rooms.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you.
You feel lost.

exits.description: The sand is glowing in this direction.

rooms.name: Sýcak Kumlar
rooms.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you.
You feel lost.

rooms.name: Sýcak Kumlar
rooms.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you.
You feel lost.

rooms.name: Sýcak Kumlar
rooms.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you.
You feel lost.

rooms.name: Göçebe Kampý
rooms.description:
This small group of desert nomads has stopped for the day to rest
and refresh themselves beside this beautiful oasis. Three tents and some
camels make up the party. From within two of the tents you hear muffled
voices, obviously surprised at your visit.

exits.description: You see inside one of the tents a huddled mass of people, probably slaves.

rooms.name: Küçük Çadýrýn Ýçinde
rooms.description:
This is a small and simple tent with few possessions in sight. Lying
here and there are young-looking men and women, possibly slaves to the
leader of this band.

exits.description: Waving in the heat over the sand you see a HUGE pyramid.
You see the center of the nomad camp.

rooms.name: Develerin Yanýnda
rooms.description:
Here stand about ten camels, all hitched to some stakes plugged into
the ground. To the east you see a small tent while to the north you see a
larger, fancier tent.

exits.description:
This tent seems to be the temporary abode of the nomad leader. You make a
mental note to visit it before you leave.
In this tent there are very large men, all carrying weapons.
You see the center of the nomad camp.

rooms.name: Savaþçýnýn Çadýrý
rooms.description:
This tent has a few furnishings, but mainly it holds the band's
protectors. They all stare at you coldly as you enter.

exits.description: Outside you see some peaceful camels.

rooms.name: Ana Çadýr
rooms.description:
This tent is as lavishly decorated on the inside as it is on the
outside. A fancy carpet lies on the sand and numerous baskets line the
walls.

rooms.name: Ana Çadýr
rooms.description:
This is where the leader of this band of nomads resides. He is
definitely rich as you inspect the tapestries, baskets, and a few
paintings as well.

exits.description: You see the entrance to this tent.

rooms.name: Iþýldayan Kum
rooms.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around
you.  But this patch of desert looks different...the sand glows.  You see a
futuristic city to the south.

rooms.name: Kanyon
rooms.description:
Being very careful not to lose your balance, you look around and
find that this canyon is about a half a kilometer deep. To the west is
a dark cave leading under the desert sands.

rooms.name: Maðara Aðzý
rooms.description:
The air in here is MUCH cooler than outside. From the west you hear
strange sounds, but can see nothing. The cave slopes down into the
darkness.

exits.description: Outside is lighter and very windy.

rooms.name: Esrarengiz Ýn
rooms.description:
You have stumbled upon the home of something. From the treasure
haphazardly strewn about and the rotting carcasses, you would guess that
this is a dragon's lair. As to what type, you can't really say. The cave
narrows out into a tunnel to the west.

rooms.name: Geniþ Tünel
rooms.description:
This tunnel seems to go on forever into the darkness. You carefully
feel your way along the walls.

rooms.name: Dar Tünel
rooms.description:
The tunnel becomes very narrow and you fight to squeeze your way through.
The floor seems to level off a little.

rooms.name: Dar Çatlak
rooms.description:
This part of the tunnel is the hardest to move through as the walls
move in to meet you.

rooms.name: Küçük ve Derin Maðara
rooms.description:
It is dark and damp and bats hang from the ceiling. A narrow crack is
in the east wall. The floor now slopes upwards.

rooms.name: Küçük Baca
rooms.description:
From within this shaft you can see a narrow hole in the roof just
large enough for one person. Back south is the cavern.
